alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 7:25PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Herkimer and northwestern Montgomery Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 725 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Little Falls. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Pea size hail and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause localized flooding. Locations impacted include... Little Falls, St. Johnsville, Garlock Corners, Charlesworth Corners, Fink Basin, Mindenville, Davys Corners, Indian Castle, Ingham Mills Station, Newville, West Saint Johnsville, Fordsbush, Wrights Corners, Deck, Smith Corners, Saint Johnsville, Jacksonburg, East Creek, Edicks and Fort Herkimer. This includes Interstate 90 near exit 29A. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
